title:
Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site
: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours       The Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site is open daily for guided house tours between 9:00 A.M. and 4:00 P.M.. Tours are approximately 45 minutes in length.  Groups of 10 or more are encouraged to make reservations. Our visitor center is open from 9:00 A.M. to 5:00 P.M. and includes exhibits, an audio presentation of Mary McLeod Bethune's last speech, and a gift shop.
